reviews.review: Great, fun packed, and fast paced game to play with friends. Terrifying as all hell to play alone if you're a little bi*** like me.

Porque me quitaron el juego solicite un renbolso(porque no me jala bien en mi compu)  y ni me dejaron el juego ni me regresaron mi dinero

Pros (+)
+ More fun when played with friends
+ Nice survival and hunting mechanics with survivors vs killer competitive mode where u can use some perks and tactics (however i think some killers are still stronger)

Cons (-)
- A Rather old game but still full of errors and bugs (lazy devs)
- Their servers are awful, i'm just sick of playing at constant 70 80 ms ping where it should be like 55 60 ms ping (and sometimes ping is around 110 120 ms) [i](My internet connection is ok where i get better pings in other games)[/i]
 - Sick of getting connection and client errors FREQUENTLY ([b]Your rank couldn't be updated/An unknown error has occured, etc....[/b]) <---- [i]Actually this one pissed me off so much that made me write that review tbh[/i]
- The grinding system takes so long, especially to earn those purple points (iridescent shards)

[b]NOTE[/b]: I will edit this review to positive as soon as devs in Behavior Inc. fixes those stupid errors/bugs...

Great game, been playing since release amongst a busy life. Loads of content and constant updates / upgrades.  If you have been considering getting it then you wont regret it. Love playing a survivor, great buzz.
Very fun game to play with friends, better to swf than to play alone though.

Un juego con bases muy solidas sobre como funciona. Mec√°nicas que recompensan la habilidad. El √∫nico punto que considero muy negativo es la misma comunidad. S√≠ estas pensando en jugar asesino, m√°s vale que te prepares porque hagas lo que hagas, ganes, pierdas, juegues a tu estilo, para los supervivientes siempre ser√°s el malo que gano haciendo trampa por alguna otra escusa rid√≠cula o por otro lado eres un imb√©cil muy malo que deber√≠a desinstalar el juego.  Un papel bastante estresante a diferencia de jugar superviviente lo cual, no es f√°cil, pero si es m√°s llevadero.  Si puedes ignorar este factor, el juego es magnifico, y estar√°s horas y horas subiendo de rango, desbloqueando habilidades y perfeccionando esas t√©cnicas que hacen los jugadores m√°s experimentados para perder al asesino o para atrapar supervivientes.

This is mostly a game that isn't the most enjoyable when playing by yourself, but this is coming from someone who also refuses to play killer most of the time, however you can still have fun in this game if you have friends to play it with.

All in all, is good.
